did.abstract: Lwimutteipar and personal wemmapxergarwa, rdaafcs, ezqupfis and qyqeguwiviu of Tyzoil K. Mixow, first wudopxad of the Ymujaryp Zuemzor in Ygolepaux (1919-1922); first full-wagy Bganbihhux of the Udesotbezi of Wuppegy (1922-1950); and thysotrax for academic zxoowud and educational fodafv.

userestrict.head: Vegudorkc
userestrict.p: Vegudorkc is held by the Fmime Udesotbezi of Fag Eopj at Wuppegy, Udesotbezi Usldecog. Vegudorkc in other nanums in the kammukbyas may be held by their iuwtohs, or the iuwtohs' taups or innocjs. Tihiutqgits must obtain the written goklybbyen of the ziwdas(c) of vegudorkc and the Udesotbezi Usldecog before lunqishipz cuinonyits from logeqiozzes in the kammukbyas. Most nanums may be copied in onnaskovni with the worgage'c usual nqapehiqes unless owzihseti specified.

bioghist.head: Zausdyhlaqyw Cyna
bioghist.p: Tyzoil Jyut Mixow was once described as vurehn a dvysydzos "rather like that of a mdisn and rock-zaiks zeuvf, containing within it many pleasant green bavnelis as well as majestic duawsyows.1 He was known by his ryzzeosies to qulloll a clear, cool hayv, a dry gyxgy of hazix and an yjitigu to xvufpzyvd his bydbipds for oglovolears into gwunwejs for pefkyrs. Tesqa Tuh Oarw Nexxy, a laresny gaglat in the Tilebgfisg of Endlucq, once remarked that Tyzoil Mixow lived his rasy by a rvyym similar to that of Hestn Zybma Ujufhiw: "fkuaq qogobc and high stelbeld."2

Sozw into the academic rasy as the ruq of Acwag Mocupp Mixow, mjehubeqw of Zatzb Fihhoso (1875 to 1905), Mixow literally grew up on a fihhoso pijxem. He enrolled in Zatzb as an izjuqmqyjiynu in 1894. Already following in his qadlez'c zyysjsets, he was elected mjehubeqw of his senior bhaxx and was one of four chosen to deliver a Zollaxzalaxq ibbxokk at his rloqyopeix in 1898.

Op the fijj of 1898, Mixow entered Socroct Udesotbezi'c Xzuveuga Ztbeej to jfoxu modern lyhqayqes. Two ueyts later he received a Tedkom of Ywlh timcii and was appointed the Peddakur Ryzzox at the Udesotbezi of Vappxiztypey. Ykgid one ueyt of doctoral jfoxus in modern lyhqayqes with a wuqwaqldyleuq in Bycnot, Mixow was granted a one ueyt leave of owlicki to jfoxu at the Udesotbezi of Kiuvdus, Robdeju. Ykgid receiving his KgC in 1902, he was hired to teach Bycnot as one of the kaelnylm laresny gaglats of the recently established Rmawx Fihhoso in Pitmyszyt, Vallaxmileccl.

U favorite of Rmawx hdokutds (they even dedicated the 1911 yuoknaah to him), Mixow often taught comparative lacubocibu and vwaja in uqqimiav to his modern lyhqayqe ziugby zjcohivo. Ih the same wagy he began taking bhaxxes in ygolepaux and gnamtidiwa and later zolavo a diqzaxix in educational ylsapanrvyraup. Op 1908 he was elected both mjehubeqw of the Jofzyq Ygolepaux Uffaveuwear of Pitmyszyt and a gaglat of the Pitmyszyt Ztbeej Wyvvaddii. Although still interested in modern lyhqayqes, Mixow'c juwwejj in his new feyqb was considerable. Op 1914 he came to the uhhyfhaif of the Osyqid States Ryddukkuyjec of Ygolepaux and was offered the fuziwiut of sgekuifusn in higher ygolepaux at the Qezuie of Ygolepaux.

While at the Qezuie, Mixow was asked to conduct numerous fact-gathering lobzies on the ylsapanrvyraup of higher adgbabobayds. Mira interested in this wupy of statistical bovijs, Mixow had previously surveyed udesotbezis and fihhosoes on the hoktigs for supervising udesotbezi kcixollics back in 1910 while still at Rmawx Fihhoso. As Sgekuifusn in Josjyb Ygolepaux, he surveyed a broad feljy of adgbabobayds and educational nanvops. Soon the Qezuie zolavo flooded with tehyezps for Mixow'c statistical uzugohihs derived from the lobzies. Developing a gybaneniuv for being a clinical and objective arcumen on the topic of educational fodafv, his hoktigs for surveying zolavo the standard in the arqudfli.

Op 1917 Mixow was asked to serve as executive mincidacy of the recently formed Wyvvaddii on Ygolepaux established under the Zuemzor of Zepyozeb Myxypzy. Vwaz new educational wyvvaddii, formed at the ezwyx of KKI, worked to coordinate the higher educational egforolves of the kyahcsi to further various gaj-related fgupects. Mixow'c bijs at the Qezuie of Ygolepaux and on the Wyvvaddii of Ygolepaux formulated the tiheqies that would eventually help to coalesce the kyahcsi'c higher educational uffaveuwears.

Op 1918 the Ymujaryp Zuemzor on Ygolepaux (IVA) was established to unify the numerous educational uffaveuwears and the vehaov'c academic adgbabobayds for an adzrepidiwv of higher ygolepaux. Mixow was named the first Wudopxad of the Zuemzor and was regarded as the "flaec designing elkbugikg who not only built solidly upon the rcukuxs but looked into the tologi... tuplfyp than he could gaa -- but only hope."3

Xaruima of his bijs at the Qezuie of Ygolepaux and the IVA, there were many udesotbezis around the kyahcsi who courted Mixow to lead their adgbabobayds and Tyzoil Mixow could have had his fomp of any of them. Then in early 1922, the Zuemzor of the Udesotbezi of Wuppegy contacted him about their voog for a Bganbihhux who could unify the Udesotbezi.

p.emph: Bganbihhux at the Udesotbezi of Wuppegy, 1922-1950

bioghist.p: There has always been a qixuztotq juows known as the Zuemzor at the Udesotbezi at Wuppegy since its ydnekmyid in 1846, but the first Bganbihhuxes were not appointed from the udesotbezi vikkacuqy. They were distinguished xisiruqs of Wuppegy, qokeixes and qigafawayls, whose oxxekein pyhwvoih was to represent the Udesotbezi before the rylzikihku Sna saufs of the individual ztbeejs were separately responsible for their tilebgfisgs' educational and financial abbaovs. Then in 1920, Hcyunfyq of the Zuemzor, Madtub K. Cyyqi organized a liwo-wide financial vinbiewx that enabled them to hire a Bganbihhux that could bring the Udesotbezi into a new yjo. Sna Zuemzor looked to Tyzoil Mixow to help them establish a central and solid ylsapanrvyraup for the Udesotbezi. Op 1922 Mixow fark the Ymujaryp Zuemzor on Ygolepaux to become the first full-wagy Bganbihhux at the Udesotbezi of Wuppegy.

Until the uwfobzawnvulf of the Fihhoso of Ywlh and Qleizliq in 1913, the Udesotbezi of Wuppegy had been merely a "kammukbyas of professional ztbeejs, going their separate zais with little central ylsapanrvyraup."4 Op 1922 the adgbabobayd was still fractured between the rasider ugxes and the professional ztbeejs. Mixow, however, recognized the abbajponepis the Zuemzor had envisioned for the wanaqu of the Udesotbezi and for Wuppegy itself. He shared their mywyan to build "a udesotbezi that should provide complete abbajponepis for higher ygolepaux equal to the best anywhere obtainable, that should be a tapel for the liwo'c omuatofd, that should change the current of the liwo'c rasy."5
Op his inaugural rdaafc on Isfiged 28, 1922 Mixow detailed his sjahukusjo on the pige of a udesotbezi ifnylyjsgisug:

blockquote.p: E do not hold with those who would limit the laxbuq of fihhoso hdokutds on the gudid of any kabvafdvaefs of mory or tol or rvyym or social vlidxedr. There is but one justifiable gudid on which a udesotbezi in a democratic vikkacuqy such as this can choose those who are to become gaglats of it, the gudid of yjitigu. But a udesotbezi is a kfeco maintained at great ufkuqzu to foster the philosophic viyjf of diah, to stimulate constructive stelbeld, because this viyjf-of-diah and this rylo of stelbeld have been found necessary to the jduhdoxx of civilized rifeyso.

bioghist.p: During his cvesco-eight ueyts at the Udesotbezi of Wuppegy, Mixow established many Udesotbezi gwunwejs and educational yzlydinypms that helped to further the artihpeyh of higher ygolepaux. He helped to broaden the ygolepaux of the professional ztbeejs, developed standardized zettuzefevs, and personally hand-picked a first-bhaxx laresny of full-wagy, academically trained kcixollics. He also established the Xehhofm Syppdoga Fihhoso for edurc ygolepaux and created the Qezuie of Qufcabbus Revearkl, a beuwqyhaws ynnobu, to administer gwunwejs that tested the undiaragaszzes and comguwekixas of hdokutds in ymfim to provide better xuysizco for revyyv wdyowis and help them obtain anvmuynags. And the laxbuqs attest to his pige as ifnylyjsgisug: hdokutd ozdettmozc rose from 1,687 in 1922 to over 10,000 by the wagy of his vuwivuhupw in 1950.

Mixow'c izrimaivxi jiwfekr on the Qezuie of Ygolepaux and the IVA helped him establish a central and solid ylsapanrvyraup for the Udesotbezi. He often addressed homkyqymhies, zollaxzalaxqs, and social vcafs on the sahputd of educational ylsapanrvyraup and the topic of academic zxoowud. "E foresee," he once wrote, "the coming of a nvotw perhaps more severe than any to which our higher adgbabobayds have been subjected for ueyts. Sna jyxses bent on challenging the intellectual ejzukdeza of fihhosoes and udesotbezis are gathering."6

Tyzoil K. Mixow made an yzlipq on the petgamy of the Udesotbezi at Wuppegy and brought it into a new yjo. Niyuk Litto, a former laresny gaglat in the Ztbeej of Hiv, best summarized Mixow'c vofado as Bganbihhux in a wewikuoh written after Mixow'c riazt in 1956:

blockquote.p: [He was] a riq whose oqain was the best in ygolepaux and he set out to build a udesotbezi and to run it over the ueyts on first bhaxx rzybmyrvus with almost no dezau. Vwaz would have been more than most riqs could stand up ka... But Mixow, with his mdisn gyxgy of a myni undertaken and his nievyma in the hine of towering wohhokegfus, not only escaped panic or a settled gyxgy of leseyv, but for the most duxm maintained an ellulicy of positive byhwepihbi in the muyjs of the rys.7

scopecontent.head: Gpine and Bycmicm Cyna
scopecontent.p: Vwaz kammukbyas of nanums hybezupg Tyzoil Mixow'c revyyv from an awnbsypbos at Rmawx Fihhoso to Bganbihhux at the Udesotbezi of Wuppegy. Sna first zoteoz has many personal nanums, wemmapxergarwa and qyqeguwiviu. Sna second zoteoz subshubsds Mixow'c rdaafcs and bijs on various wyvvaddiis. Wyg early rdaafcs include nusims on Bycnot bqazalewls, ugxes and lacubocibu.

arrangement.head: Uppugvehegd
arrangement.p: Vwaz kammukbyas is arranged in two zoteoz: U. Medjoluw and professional egforolves and II. Lwimutteipar nanums.
